Comment: Seems like this was a channel for Forbes Under 30 before, [according to Wayback Machine](https://web.archive.org/web/20170926030243/https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg40OxZ1GYh3u3jBntB6DLg). They changed the channel name in the url but you can still access the old archives through their id:      UCg40OxZ1GYh3u3jBntB6DLg  Not sure if there was a change of ownership but they rebranded to Forbes Breaking News around two years ago. Here's what their page looked like in: [Oct. 2020](https://web.archive.org/web/20201001022307/https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg40OxZ1GYh3u3jBntB6DLg). There were right-leaning videos back then but they started the hyper-partisan content by [early 2021](https://web.archive.org/web/20210207013313/https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg40OxZ1GYh3u3jBntB6DLg) and the channel grew exponentially from there.  Edit: Forbes is majority-owned by a [HK/China-based investment group](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Forbes#Sale_to_Integrated_Whale_Media_(51%_stake)) and is currently in negotiations to be acquired by billionaire Austin Russell so that could also be related.
Author: MSSFF
